alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 4:48PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wasatch and southeastern Utah Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 448 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Mapleton, or 21 miles east of Payson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Strawberry Reservoir. This includes the following highways... US Route 6 between mile markers 188 and 203. US Route 40 between mile markers 46 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
